fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Swap two people, during the day or night. You may self target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, swapping players transfers all abilities used between each other. As in, you're basically a Transporter. Players learn they were swapped.
- During the day, all abilities used on the swapped players are used on the other player, but all votes are as well. As in, if player A was supposed to be hanged but is swapped with player B, player B is hanged.
- Your day ability takes place at the end of the day. Also, the players are swapped *publicly.*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who will not submit to the Mafia.
